page.title: 09MILVERTON'S TWIN TOWN
page.content:
I INTERVIEWED NICHOLAS HOYLE FROM CLASS 3 ABOUT HIS TRIP TO FRANCE. HE WENT WITH A LOT OF PEOPLE FROM MILVERTON TO A PLACE CALLED LONGNY AU PERCHE BECAUSE THAT IS MILVERTON'S TWIN TOWN. NICHOLAS SAID THAT HE DID NOT GET SEA SICK. WHEN HE GOT TO FRANCE IT WAS VERY BUSY, NOT AT ALL LIKE MILVERTON. IT WAS VERY STRANGE THAT THERE WERE NO TREES IN THE TOWN BUT A LOT OF TREES OUTSIDE IT. LONGNY AU PERCHE IS ABOUT THE SAME SIZE AS MILVERTON AND ALSO IT HAS ABOUT THE SAME NUMBER OF SHOPS.
THE FOOD THAT NICHOLAS LIKED MOST WAS TRIPE AND ALL THE DIFFERENT KINDS OF FISH THAT THEY HAD. HE STAYED WITH A FRENCH FAMILY AND SAYS THAT THEY WERE VERY NICE AND KIND. EVERYBODY ENJOYED THE TRIP VERY MUCH.
